source.name: Assessment Actions
source.description:
Actions on Applications in 2012 Reducing Assessments or Reclassifying Property. 

Listed here are Tax Commission actions during 2012 reducing assessments or reclassifying property.

KEY:  YR=Assessment year (11=2011/12; 12=2012/13); R=Reduction implemented by remission of taxes; B=Borough (1=Manhattan, 2=Bronx, 3=Brooklyn, 4=Queens, 5=Staten Island); TC=Tax Class or subclass.

KEY:  YR=Assessment year (11=2011/12; 12=2012/13); R=Reduction implemented by remission of taxes; B=Borough (1=Manhattan, 2=Bronx, 3=Brooklyn, 4=Queens, 5=Staten Island); TC=Tax Class or subclass.
